title: Database management
alert.backup_ready: The backup may take some time before being ready
db.not_be_compatible: This database may not be compatible
db.create.modal.header.title: Create Database
db.create.modal.body.text: To enhance your experience, some data may be sent to Odoo online services. See our
db.create.form.name: Database Name
db.create.form.title: Only alphanumerical characters, underscore, hyphen and dot are allowed
db.backup.modal.header.title: Backup Database
db.duplicate.modal.header.title: Duplicate Database
db.duplicate.modal.body.name: Database Name
db.duplicate.modal.body.title: Only alphanumerical characters, underscore, hyphen and dot are allowed
db.delete.modal.header.title: Delete Database
db.delete.modal.body.name: Database
db.restore.modal.header.title: Restore Database
db.restore.modal.body.name: Database Name
db.restore.modal.body.title: Only alphanumerical characters, underscore, hyphen and dot are allowed
db.restore.modal.body.copy: This database might have been moved or copied.
db.restore.modal.body.p:
In order to avoid conflicts between databases, Needs to know if this database was moved or copied.
If you don't know, answer "This database is a copy".
db.set_pwd.modal.header.title: Set Master Password
db.set_pwd.modal.body.p: The master password is required to create, delete, dump or restore databases.
